name: European Chilled Food Federation
goal: ECFF works to promote the safety and quality of chilled prepared foods in the EU's EUR 25bn market. ECFF represents the industry and its views to European decision makers and regulatory bodies, coordinates the activities of national chilled food organisations, liaises with other industry associations, regulatory authorities, research organisations, retailer and consumer groups
interests: Consumer Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Public Health, Trade
euInitiatives: Hygiene, biocides, labelling of foodstuffs, provision of information to consumers, nutrition
